attributes.additional_details: I am being discriminated because I'm overweight and being told I can't have IVF because of this, yet I meet all the other requirements. Basically I'm being told I can't have a family because I'm FAT. Please sign my petition which will be handed to the right people so I can try to get funding for IVF. 11 years is a long time to have a dream. We only want to be parents, is that so bad a thing to ask for.
